Packages that use VerticalDatumType
Package
Description
org.opengis.referencing.datum
Relationship of a Coordinate System (CS) to the Earth, another celestial body or a platform.

    Field
    Description
    static final VerticalDatumType
    VerticalDatumType.BAROMETRIC
    Deprecated.
    The origin of the vertical axis is based on atmospheric pressure.
    static final VerticalDatumType
    VerticalDatumType.DEPTH
    Deprecated.
    The zero point is defined by a surface that has meaning for the purpose which the associated vertical measurements are used for.
    static final VerticalDatumType
    VerticalDatumType.GEOIDAL
    Deprecated.
    The zero value is defined to approximate a constant potential surface, usually the geoid.
    static final VerticalDatumType
    VerticalDatumType.OTHER_SURFACE
    Deprecated.
    The zero value is defined by a method not described by the other enumeration values in this class.
